title: Amazon is having a Valentine's Day sale on its Kindle and Fire gadgets - Business Insider
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase. 
Amazon 
They say a couple that reads together, stays together. Alright, maybe they don't, but that hasn't stopped Amazon from discounting most of the Kindle line. If you have a special bookworm in your life, you might want to take note. 
Three out of the four members of the Kindle family: The 6-inch Kindle , Kindle Paperwhite , and Kindle Voyage are all $20 off. 
These aren't the steepest discounts we've ever seen on these products, but it's the first hardware sale Amazon has held this year. 
If you're looking for a better deal, you can get the "Essentials Bundle" for either the Kindle , Kindle Paperwhite , or Kindle Voyage for $35, $40, and $45 off, respectively. 
Amazon has even discounted its recently-released Kindle for Kids Bundle by $20, taking it down to $80. 
If your special someone is more into media than just books, Amazon has also discounted its Fire Tablet by $10 ; they've also discounted the Fire Tablet Kid's Edition by $20, which is as cheap as its ever been.
